Description.Text: Situated in San Antonio, this hotel is 2.1 mi (3.5 km) from Quarry Golf Club and 2.5 mi (4 km) from Marion Koogler McNay Art Museum. North Star Mall and Alamo Quarry Market are also within 3 mi (5 km).

Start each day with a hot full breakfast and unwind at our evening social* Monday through Thursday. Forget your toothbrush or need a quick snack? Visit the on-site 24-hour Suite Shop . Call ahead and take advantage of our grocery shopping service and your kitchen will be stocked before you even arrive.
